name: Overview
data: [{"id":"bb7d17ee-1c47-4894-b2b2-3ae7a0ee799b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class: Fasten","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"df6ef738-be14-4361-b256-1a332d0ad722","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"110a15ff-6a3f-4111-8114-092698ab367b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class acts as the central coordinator for transforming Python code analysis results into a FASTEN-compliant representation. It consumes structured output from a call graph generator and systematically converts it into standardized artifacts such as dependencies, namespaces, class hierarchies, and call graphs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"67348551-beca-4961-b2bb-29df0bf1e4f9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Rather than performing analysis itself, this class focuses on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"normalization, organization, and assembly","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of analysis data, ensuring compatibility with the FASTEN schema and downstream tooling.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"31f23ec9-73e1-4ce2-86db-06edaffe63e7","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e676f087-58c7-49ea-ac5b-dbc647d48b7d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Responsibilities","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"effddee8-dd87-4a3e-a453-0d197659fa06","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The responsibilities of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class can be understood through its functional groups, each addressing a distinct aspect of the FASTEN generation process.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dba09314-bdb9-4cbf-a412-b4c71f895965","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"23d3dc90-dd10-4f9e-8b9e-db366096d5f6","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Initialization and Identifier Management","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c33305d5-dec9-4a33-b4ff-585309ae6ede","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group establishes the internal state required for FASTEN generation. It initializes metadata, collects analysis outputs from the call graph generator, and manages unique identifiers used to reference namespaces consistently across the generated artifacts.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"04688882-6809-46b7-b2f0-0f1148281a58","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These responsibilities ensure that all later transformations operate on a well-defined and stable internal representation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ce949de5-94a5-4ade-9264-76ad707876f5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"5f97d182-1b5c-44ea-8377-067b74403e10","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"URI and Namespace Resolution","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8eee92cd-7844-4004-b8fb-59a9a9e853a8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group is responsible for translating Python modules, namespaces, and functions into standardized FASTEN URIs. It also creates efficient lookup mappings that distinguish between internal and external code elements.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e2d450c7-41b3-42d6-8e18-9892c079b8f3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By centralizing URI and namespace resolution, this group enables consistent referencing across class hierarchies, call graphs, and module definitions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"33e083f1-6206-482d-a966-c13ffedd40e6","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"cdf01399-9c8a-4167-8b3a-ff4611ce841a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"FASTEN Structure Generation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3f4cd53d-aadb-4045-b10a-f58875ade9b1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group constructs the core FASTEN schema components. It generates dependency sets from package metadata, builds module and namespace definitions, derives class inheritance relationships, and separates internal and external call graph edges.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d50b28df-98d5-4a51-bad5-1dad4116f488","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Together, these operations culminate in assembling a complete FASTEN-compliant document that accurately represents the analyzed software package.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da4c2478-ba55-49d6-9b4b-890073beedc2","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"3d45cebf-649f-4ca0-a068-ae19fdd2bdf5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Perspective","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3f70d71-a9df-46c9-962e-b7afbd80e87f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"From a design standpoint, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class functions as a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"facade and orchestrator","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":", hiding the complexity of FASTEN schema construction behind a clear and modular interface. Each functional group contributes a well-scoped part of the final output, promoting readability, maintainability, and extensibility.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a84bbc6b-3111-457f-8b84-7a5380f7566d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"57730f86-d70b-40bc-ba98-47e1632048db","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
